Question
========

The effects of three different drugs are examined one. A researcher therefore establishes three confidence intervals for the possible comparison of the three drugs. She wants to keep the confidence level for all comparisons to be at least 95%. This is an example of

Answerlist
----------

* Multiple comparison
* Multiple correlation
* Multiple regression

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Multiple comparison: Correct
* Multiple correlation: Incorrect
* Multiple regression: Incorrect
